Bootcamp

A free seminar that prepares you for the top university applications.

How it Works

In a seminar group of 8-10 people, you will learn from our trainers, who are studying at one of our target universities, how you can apply successfully. The exact program varies for each participant depending on your seminar group and target school.

Bootcamp 2021

Bootcamp 2020 took place from July 31st to August 2nd. The details for the boot camp 2021 are currently being worked out. You can already register for the Bootcamp 2021! â€‹ In 2021, the bootcamp will be open to Master and PhD applicants for the first time. We will organize a seminar group of 8-12 participants for "Graduate" applicants.

The Schedule

Day 0

Thursday

Attend our Bootcamp, a three day university application seminar, and acquire the skills needed to craft a successful application.

Day 1

Friday

Attend our Bootcamp, a three day university application seminar, and acquire the skills needed to craft a successful application.

Day 2

Saturday

Attend our Bootcamp, a three day university application seminar, and acquire the skills needed to craft a successful application.

Day 3

Sunday

Attend our Bootcamp, a three day university application seminar, and acquire the skills needed to craft a successful application.

Frequently Asked Questions

Sign Up Here for Help with Your Applications

To find out more about how Project Access can help you, we only ask for your first name and your email address to send you more information. Just fill out the form below and we will get in touch!
